channel.title: Integrations on Fluid Player Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Integrations on Fluid Player Documentation

item.title: Integration
item.description: Quick Integration Note We have recently our new Fluid Player Builder. Customise your player for the easiest integration yet! In order to set Fluid Player, three things are required: The Javascript and CSS files of the player; An HTML5 <video> tag; A single Javascript line of code that attaches the player to the video tag. <html> <head> <title>Fluid Player</title> <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.fluidplayer.com/v2/current/fluidplayer.min.css" type="text/css"/> <script src="https://cdn.fluidplayer.com/v2/current/fluidplayer.min.js"></script> </head> <body> <video id='my-video'> <source src='vid.
